content: Commercial by Perfetti Van Melle to encourage childbirthThis article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "National Night" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(November 2022)* **National Night** is a commercial by [Perfetti Van Melle](/wiki/Perfetti_Van_Melle), the makers of [Mentos](/wiki/Mentos) to encourage [procreation](/wiki/Procreation) on the night of [National Day](/wiki/National_Day_(Singapore)) of Singapore in 2012 to express patriotism. - Smithsonian Magazine; [Nuwer, Rachel](/wiki/Rachel_Nuwer). "Singapore's "National Night" Encourages Citizens to Make Babies". *Smithsonian Magazine*. - Taylor, Adam. "Singapore Made This Insane Rap Video Telling People To Procreate On Thursday". *Business Insider*. - Staff Reporter (17 August 2012). "Why Mentos' "National Night" was anti-climactic". *Singapore Business Review*. - Lametti, Daniel (10 August 2012). "Can a Mentos Ad Promote Baby-Making?". *Slate Magazine*. This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: National Night
